customStages.label: Autolyse
customStages.instructions: Add 500g bread flour and 350g water at the beginning of this stage.

customStages.label: Mix
customStages.instructions: Add 150g active sourdough starter and 10g salt at the beginning of this stage.

customStages.label: Bulk Ferment
customStages.instructions: Perform stretch and folds every 30 minutes for the first 2 hours if desired.

customStages.label: Knockdown
customStages.instructions: Degas dough gently, then rest.

customStages.label: Shape & Proof
customStages.instructions: Shape dough and proof outside the machine. Bake after this stage.

customStages.label: Autolyse
customStages.instructions: Add 400g bread flour and 280g water at the beginning of this stage.

customStages.label: Mix
customStages.instructions: Add 120g active sourdough starter and 8g salt at the beginning of this stage.

customStages.label: Bulk Ferment
customStages.instructions: Perform stretch and folds every 30 minutes for the first 2 hours if desired.

customStages.label: Knockdown
customStages.instructions: Degas dough gently, then rest.

customStages.label: Proof
customStages.instructions: Score dough now, then close lid to bake.

customStages.label: Cool
customStages.instructions: Remove bread when cool.

customStages.label: Autolyse
customStages.instructions: Add 500g bread flour and 325g water at the beginning of this stage.

customStages.label: Mix
customStages.instructions: Add 100g sourdough starter, 10g salt, and 30g olive oil at the beginning of this stage.

customStages.label: Bulk Ferment
customStages.instructions: Perform stretch and folds every 30 minutes for the first 2 hours if desired.

customStages.label: Knockdown
customStages.instructions: Degas dough gently, then rest.

customStages.label: Cold Proof
customStages.instructions: Refrigerate dough. Use as needed after this stage.

customStages.label: Mix
customStages.instructions: Add 500g bread flour, 300g water, 7g instant yeast, 10g salt, 30g butter at the beginning of this stage.

customStages.label: Cool
customStages.instructions: Remove bread when cool.

customStages.label: Mix
customStages.instructions: Add 300g whole wheat flour, 200g bread flour, 350g water, 8g instant yeast, 10g salt, 30g honey at the beginning of this stage.

customStages.label: Cool
customStages.instructions: Remove bread when cool.

customStages.label: Mix
customStages.instructions: Add 500g bread flour, 200g milk, 100g water, 2 eggs, 10g instant yeast, 10g salt, 60g sugar, 60g butter at the beginning of this stage.

customStages.label: Cool
customStages.instructions: Remove bread when cool.

customStages.label: Mix
customStages.instructions: Add 300g rye flour, 200g bread flour, 350g water, 10g instant yeast, 10g salt, 20g molasses at the beginning of this stage.

customStages.label: Cool
customStages.instructions: Remove bread when cool.

customStages.label: Incubate
customStages.instructions: Add 1L milk and 2 tbsp yogurt starter at the beginning of this stage.

customStages.label: Heat Milk
customStages.instructions: Add 2L milk and starter culture at the beginning of this stage. Add 1/4 tsp rennet if required. Remove curds when formed.

customStages.label: Melt
customStages.instructions: Add 300g chocolate (chopped) at the beginning of this stage.

customStages.label: Sugar Melt
customStages.instructions: Add 200g granulated sugar and 60ml water. Mix until sugar dissolves.

customStages.label: Heat & Stir
customStages.instructions: Once sugar is amber, carefully add 120ml warm heavy cream, 56g butter, 1/4 tsp salt. Mixture will bubble vigorously.

customStages.label: Cook
customStages.instructions: Cook until mixture reaches soft-ball stage (116-118°C). Add 1 tsp vanilla extract at end.

customStages.label: Cool
customStages.instructions: Let caramel cool and thicken. Pour into prepared container when done.

customStages.label: Sous Vide
customStages.instructions: Fill with water, set desired temperature. Seal food in bag and submerge. For eggs or fragile items, do not use mixing.

customStages.label: Dry
customStages.instructions: Place clean herbs in a single layer. Leave lid slightly open for ventilation.

customStages.label: Gentle Melt
customStages.instructions: Add cold butter (up to 250g). Watch carefully to avoid browning.

customStages.label: Hold Warm
customStages.instructions: Butter will stay liquid but won't brown. Use as needed.

customStages.label: Heat
customStages.instructions: Fill with water. Place clean jars or containers to be sanitized.

customStages.label: Hold
customStages.instructions: Keep containers submerged. Remove carefully when done.

customStages.label: Maintain Warm
customStages.instructions: Add a small dish of warm water for humidity. Place covered dough inside to proof.

customStages.label: Melt
customStages.instructions: Add beeswax pieces. For candle or cosmetic making. Use container you can dispose of or dedicate to wax.

customStages.label: Hold
customStages.instructions: Keeps wax liquid for pouring. Add oils or scents if desired.

customStages.label: Warm
customStages.instructions: Add rolled damp towels. Keep lid closed until ready to use.

customStages.label: Heat Oil Phase
customStages.instructions: Add oils, butters, emulsifier, and oil-soluble ingredients.

customStages.label: Cool & Mix
customStages.instructions: Add water phase ingredients. Mix until emulsified and cooled.
